overview: In a total destruction of social constructs, Carl decides to crash the wedding of his former best friends taking place in the California desert. While he was initially invited to the wedding, he became disinvited once his fianc√© broke up with him and his friends chose her side. When things go sideways in the desert, Carl must decide whether to risk his life to save those who have wronged him or look the other way to save himself.
title: The Disinvited
